mapper.sql: id, alias, fullname, openbankname, openbankno, address, linkman, mobile, telno, comment, reserve1, reserve2
mapper.select:
select
from t_jxs where 1=1
and (alias like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%') or fullname like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name}),'%'))
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update t_jxs
alias = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fullname = #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
openbankname = #{openbankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
openbankno = #{openbankno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

telno = #{telno,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserve1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserve2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_jxs set alias = #{alias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fullname = #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, openbankname = #{openbankname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, openbankno = #{openbankno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, linkman = #{linkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telno = #{telno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserve1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reserve2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
